ticket.title: TB3.0.10: Can't open links; info in 'folders' missing
ticket.original-body:
Hello,
I don't even know if I am in the right place to send my problems and question; if I am not, please direct me to a site that can help me. I have already been to GetSatisfaction (of which I got none...satisfaction) and numerous other forums and sites.
My problem is that I can't open the links in ANY of my emails...none, nada, zip, zilch. I have to copy and paste and that is very time consuming. I spend almost 6 hrs a day trying to find a solution to this, as well as the numerous other problems I have had with TB.
For instance, one day my "folders' and all of the information that I saved in them are gone! Big surprise when I went to look something up in my folders that was there the day before only to find that now it was gone, gone, gone.
Can you help me where I can retrieve the lost info in my folders? Or how to open the links in my emails? If not, can you suggest a site where I can find this info. I have already been to numerous sites/forums including GetSatisfaction and I can't get an answer that makes sense to me.
Thank you.
Blessings.
Shiloh

version.title: TB3.0.10: Can't open links; info in 'folders' missing

version.body: This seems like a "your-application" bug and not a Rails bug. Please ask on the irc channel #rubyonrails on irc.freenode.net or http://stackoverflow.com
version.body-html: This seems like a "your-application" bug and not a Rails bug. Please ask on the irc channel #rubyonrails on irc.freenode.net or http://stackoverflow.com
